text: Manzini (formerly known as Bremersdorp) is a city in Eswatini; it is the capital of Eswatiniâ€™s Manzini District. The city is the country's second largest urban centre behind Mbabane, with a population of 78,000 (2008). It is known as "The Hub" of Eswatini and lies on the MR3 road. Category:Cities in Eswatini Category:Capital cities in Africa
title: Manzini, Eswatini
